name: leojs
displayName: Leo Editor for Visual Studio Code
description: LeoJS — The literate editor with outline javaScript implementation

leojs.checkForChangeExternalFiles.description: Set default for checking changes to external files

leojs.defaultReloadIgnore.description: Set default for derived files so that they reload, or ignore, when changes are detected

leojs.sessionPerWorkspace.description: Keeps one session of files to open per workspace. Setting to false will keep a single session of files to reopen for all instances.

leojs.leoTreeBrowse.description: Specifies whether to use Leo's style of tree browsing with the arrow keys

leojs.treeKeepFocus.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when selecting a node - overridden by "leoTreeBrowse"

leojs.treeKeepFocusWhenAside.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when opening a detached body pane on the side

leojs.goAnywhereShortcut.description: Enables Leo's 'Go Anywhere' to replace 'Go to file' with the Ctrl+P keyboard shortcut when focus in in outline or body

leojs.collapseAllShortcut.description: Enables the Alt+'-' keyboard shortcut for collapsing all folders in the Explorer View

leojs.activityViewShortcut.description: Enables the Ctrl+Shift+L keyboard shortcut for showing the LeoJS view

leojs.treeInExplorer.description: Shows the outline tree in the explorer view

leojs.showFileOnOutline.description: Shows 'New', 'Open' and 'Save' buttons on the outline pane

leojs.showHoistDehoistOnOutline.description: Shows 'Hoist' and 'Dehoist' buttons on the outline pane

leojs.showPrevNextOnOutline.description: Shows 'Previous' and 'Next' visited node buttons on the outline pane

leojs.showPromoteDemoteOnOutline.description: Shows 'Promote' and 'Demote' buttons on the outline pane

leojs.showRecentFilesOnOutline.description: Shows 'Recent Files' button on the outline pane

leojs.showSettingsOnOutline.description: Shows 'LeoJS Settings' button on the outline pane

leojs.showShowLogOnOutline.description: Shows 'Open Log Pane' button on the outline pane

leojs.showUndoRedoOnOutline.description: Shows 'Undo' and 'Redo' buttons on the outline pane

leojs.showEditOnNodes.description: Shows 'Edit Headline' button on tree nodes

leojs.invertNodeContrast.description: Inverts the contrast of the dirty/clean border aspect of tree nodes

leojs.leoID.description: Used to uniquely identify nodes - Defaults to the OS/Environment user name
leojs.leoID.patternErrorMessage: Your id should contain only letters and numbers, and must contain at least 3 characters.

leojs.showUnlOnStatusBar.description: Displays an UNL indicator on the status bar

viewsWelcome.contents: Starting up leojs...
Starting up leojs...
Opening file...
Opening file...

Open a remote repository to enable LeoJS
[Open Remote Repository](command:remoteHub.openRepository)
See [Opening a project](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/vscode-web#_opening-a-project) for more info.

Open a remote repository to enable LeoJS
[Open Remote Repository](command:remoteHub.openRepository)
See [Opening a project](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/vscode-web#_opening-a-project) for more info.

Choose your LeoID to start
[Enter an id](command:leojs.setLeoID)

Choose your LeoID to start
[Enter an id](command:leojs.setLeoID)

[Open Leo File](command:leojs.openLeoFile)
[Create Leo File](command:leojs.newLeoFile)
[Recent Leo Files](command:leojs.recentLeoFiles)
View LeoJS [configuration settings](command:leojs.showSettingsPage)
